page.title: 14The River Dee
page.content: The River Dee runs through our block. It is famous for its salmon fishing and its royal connections.There are lots of small streams that join the Dee in our block.The river runs down to Aberdeen and into the North Sea. Aberdeen gets its name from the River Dee as the word "aber" means "mouth", so Aberdeen means,"The mouth of the River Dee".The river starts up in the Cairngorm Mountains.It runs from west to east through our block and is quite wide.It has a lot of stones in its bed and banks and varies from quite deep to very shallow.It is not too fast flowing except in spate.Many people pay a lot of money to fish for salmon on the Dee.Poaching is a problem.The Dee is very clear and clean and is good for wildlife,including otters and kingfishers.Many people use it for leisure and it supplies all our water.
